description: Root application entry point that redirects based on authentication status. When unauthenticated, redirects to /login (HTTP 302). When authenticated, redirects to /profile. Serves as the main application entry point.

details.authentication: N/A - Performs redirect based on auth status

notes: Root redirect endpoint. Always returns 302 FOUND status. Redirects to /login for unauthenticated users or /profile for authenticated users. No static content served at root.",
